long_desc.thetext: The list of attachments can get long, e.g. if multiple iterations of a patch are discussed. The task editor should have a filter to hide deprecated attachments (similar to the Bugzilla web UI).
A first pass has been committed. The basic functionality is there but we need a better icon. I have put this on the meeting agenda for UI review.

Steffen,
we have now the problem the it a user select "Open Attachment in Task Editor" of an obsolete attachment we get "Attachment is not attached to the opened bug".
We should
a) disable this option b) add the obsolete Tast to the table and select it.
Good point. We should unfilter the table in that case to make the selected attachment visible.
Mik suggested to use a crossed out remove icon.
I have updated the icon and fixed the issue mentioned in comment #3: the table is now unfiltered if a hidden attachment is clicked.
